message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you our premium product which I believe would greatly benefit your business. Given its value to you, I propose a price of $12,000 for the product.
Hi Alice, thanks for the offer, but that price is a bit too high for me right now.  Would you consider $8,000?
I understand your position, Bob. Considering the value this product holds for you, I am willing to negotiate further. My counteroffer is $9,500 for the product.
Alice, I appreciate you working with me.  To be honest, $9,000 is the highest I can go.  What do you say?
Thank you for your flexibility, Bob. I am willing to accept $9,300 for the product, considering its value to you.
Alice, I'm trying my best to make this work, but I need to stay closer to my budget. Would you do $9,100?
Considering your budget constraints, I am willing to accept $9,200 for the product. This is the highest I can go while still maintaining a fair profit margin.
